title: BGM20Biel
author: BGM20Biel
content: Greetings, Bitcointalk community!I am excited to share with you an incredible opportunity to participate in Pi Network, a rapidly growing new cryptocurrency. Pi Network aims to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone by allowing users to mine Pi from their mobile phones without draining battery or consuming unnecessary resources.Why should you join Pi Network? Here are a few reasons:User-friendly: With an intuitive interface, Pi Network has made cryptocurrency mining accessible to anyone. No advanced technical knowledge required!Growth potential: As an early-stage cryptocurrency, Pi Network offers the opportunity to get involved from the start. As the community grows, the potential for Pi's value appreciation increases.Security and reliability: The Pi Network team consists of security and cryptography experts, ensuring the protection of your data and transactions.But here's the best part! By joining using my invitation code, both of us will receive a bonus. Just follow these steps:Download the Pi Network app from your mobile app store.Sign up using my invitation code: [BGM20Biel].Start mining Pi Network every day with just a tap of a button.Don't miss out on the opportunity to be a part of this exciting crypto revolution. Together, we can build a more inclusive and decentralized financial future!If you have any questions or need further information, feel free to reply to this post. I'm here to assist!Let's join forces and mine Pi Network together!BGM20Biel

comments.author: israt1@
comments.body: I would like to know if you are a member of the Project? If so please help me sell the tokens received from the app.

comments.author: barlo357
comments.body: It has been year since the pi network was introduced but the coin still has no value. With the huge amount of people mining pi since it was introduced, the supply would mostly be around a hundred million to a billion so don't expect that a single unit of it would be the likes of bitcoin and ethereum.

comments.author: Rampagoe004
comments.body: Quote from: BGM20Biel on May 29, 2023, 06:44:51 PMWhy should you join Pi Network? Here are a few reasons:User-friendly: With an intuitive interface, Pi Network has made cryptocurrency mining accessible to anyone. No advanced technical knowledge required!Growth potential: As an early-stage cryptocurrency, Pi Network offers the opportunity to get involved from the start. As the community grows, the potential for Pi's value appreciation increases.Security and reliability: The Pi Network team consists of security and cryptography experts, ensuring the protection of your data and transactions.Download the Pi Network app from your mobile app store.Sign up using my invitation code: [BGM20Biel].Start mining Pi Network every day with just a tap of a button.Don't miss out on the opportunity to be a part of this exciting crypto revolution. Together, we can build a more inclusive and decentralized financial future!I still see the Pi Network as a coin that still has no value. I'm not saying it's a scam project but I see that Pi Network still doesn't have a reason for me to join.Some of the reasons you've mentioned weren't something I should join. User friendly, Growth potential and Security and reliability are common reasons of all the projects I have encountered.  Some are scam projects and some are successful.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: BGM20Biel on May 29, 2023, 06:44:51 PMGreetings, Bitcointalk community!I am excited to share with you an incredible opportunity to participate in Pi Network, a rapidly growing new cryptocurrency. Pi Network aims to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone by allowing users to mine Pi from their mobile phones without draining battery or consuming unnecessary resources.Stop spouting bullshit. This shit token isn’t new because this Pi Network was announced last 2018 and until now this bullshit mining still doesn't materialize on a mainnet or gives real value to the tokens. Stop daydreaming.Quote from: spreee on June 16, 2023, 04:21:10 PMI am afraid that when you see enough reasons to join it will be too late, so don't delay and start mining today - https://www.touristmaker.com/pi-network-invitation-code/ Lmao, this crap mining is existing fpr 5 years without any value at all. The link seems suspicious too so I will warn other user here to not click your invitation link.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Lol! Pi network is a scam beyond your imagination! It's less of a crypto scam and more of a KYC scam. Ask yourself a simple question! If anyone in the world can use their smartphones and start mining a coin for free, why would anyone else buy that coin from exchanges against money? Wouldn't they mine it from their mobile phone? If you get the answer to this question,, you will also understand that Pi coins will never have real value. Also, you need to do an extensive KYC in order to use the mined Pi coins, so if you like to maintain your privacy, avoid this project like a plague.

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: Quote from: barlo357 on May 29, 2023, 08:19:56 PMIt has been year since the pi network was introduced but the coin still has no value. With the huge amount of people mining pi since it was introduced, the supply would mostly be around a hundred million to a billion so don't expect that a single unit of it would be the likes of bitcoin and ethereum.The coin still doesn't have any value? I thought there are rumors of people selling their coin and they were even making mockery of people like us who have not been minting it.

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: Quote from: avikz on June 16, 2023, 04:38:57 PMLol! Pi network is a scam beyond your imagination! It's less of a crypto scam and more of a KYC scam. Ask yourself a simple question! If anyone in the world can use their smartphones and start mining a coin for free, why would anyone else buy that coin from exchanges against money? Wouldn't they mine it from their mobile phone? If you get the answer to this question,, you will also understand that Pi coins will never have real value. Also, you need to do an extensive KYC in order to use the mined Pi coins, so if you like to maintain your privacy, avoid this project like a plague. Don't mind them, they want to pretend as though they don't know that that coin pi is a very big scam. I wonder what will even make them believe that they can ever get any meaningful thing from it. Even if they decide to launch that coin today, with the volume of coin already in the hands of people, they will crash that coin to zero

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: Victorik on June 16, 2023, 05:03:37 PMQuote from: avikz on June 16, 2023, 04:38:57 PMLol! Pi network is a scam beyond your imagination! It's less of a crypto scam and more of a KYC scam. Ask yourself a simple question! If you get the answer to this question,, you will also understand that Pi coins will never have real value. Also, you need to do an extensive KYC in order to use the mined Pi coins, so if you like to maintain your privacy, avoid this project like a plague. Don't mind them, they want to pretend as though they don't know that that coin pi is a very big scam. I wonder what will even make them believe that they can ever get any meaningful thing from it. Even if they decide to launch that coin today, with the volume of coin already in the hands of people, they will crash that coin to zeroSo how did these people manage to get their hands on such huge amount of pi? Because I always sees the whole pi mining thing as slow and very restricted. I actually have a close relative that has been mining pi for quite a long time and he doesn't have such a big amount that you are referring to. Could it be some part of the team members or the very early adopters. The only thing I find very discouraging is the time it has taken them to launch mainnet and be traded. I don't any scam that will waste so much time, scammers are usually quick to get the money and disappear, certainly not the way pi is operating in.

comments.body: Quote from: Victorik on June 16, 2023, 05:01:21 PMQuote from: barlo357 on May 29, 2023, 08:19:56 PMIt has been year since the pi network was introduced but the coin still has no value. With the huge amount of people mining pi since it was introduced, the supply would mostly be around a hundred million to a billion so don't expect that a single unit of it would be the likes of bitcoin and ethereum.The coin still doesn't have any value? I thought there are rumors of people selling their coin and they were even making mockery of people like us who have not been minting it. I don't know how people are selling Pi network coin, where team claimed still they didn’t launch their main net. Right now it can't be transfer in a wallet to other. It’s just hyped when a fake PI coin is listed in the several exchanges. Also i think still there are no real value of Pi Coin, it’s kinda scam project to me.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: I created a topic about this coin not long time ago: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455154.msg62357995#msg62357995I don´t own or mine this "coin" but I don't understand if people can make up to $700 a month from just push a button daily on their phone, this coin would be the solution to many problems in the world.

comments.author: gabbie2010
comments.body: Quote from: Victorik on June 16, 2023, 05:01:21 PMQuote from: barlo357 on May 29, 2023, 08:19:56 PMIt has been year since the pi network was introduced but the coin still has no value. With the huge amount of people mining pi since it was introduced, the supply would mostly be around a hundred million to a billion so don't expect that a single unit of it would be the likes of bitcoin and ethereum.The coin still doesn't have any value? I thought there are rumors of people selling their coin and they were even making mockery of people like us who have not been minting it. Actually there are some news which was made by pi network promoters to hype the coin just make look real, infact they mentioned some stores that accept pi token in exchange of goods meanwhile all the gimmick is just to portray the pi network in a positive light, I knew some close friends who mined the coin with the hope of exchanging it with USDT after summiting  and performanced their KYC unfortunately the coin hasn't gotten any value yet and some of these colleagues had "locked up"  their coin just like Stalking cryptocurrency for a period of some years aiming of earning more coin whose value is currently worthless.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Quote from: gabbie2010 on June 16, 2023, 08:09:51 PMQuote from: Victorik on June 16, 2023, 05:01:21 PMQuote from: barlo357 on May 29, 2023, 08:19:56 PMIt has been year since the pi network was introduced but the coin still has no value. With the huge amount of people mining pi since it was introduced, the supply would mostly be around a hundred million to a billion so don't expect that a single unit of it would be the likes of bitcoin and ethereum.The coin still doesn't have any value? I thought there are rumors of people selling their coin and they were even making mockery of people like us who have not been minting it. Actually there are some news which was made by pi network promoters to hype the coin just make look real, infact they mentioned some stores that accept pi token in exchange of goods meanwhile all the gimmick is just to portray the pi network in a positive light, I knew some close friends who mined the coin with the hope of exchanging it with USDT after summiting  and performanced their KYC unfortunately the coin hasn't gotten any value yet and some of these colleagues had "locked up"  their coin just like Stalking cryptocurrency for a period of some years aiming of earning more coin whose value is currently worthless.This happened before. Do you remember TBC? The coin that increases its value everyday without cutting the supply. It happened that Pi is doing the same that are convincing merchants to accept Pi as a payment method for their products. There are testimonies too just like TBC. There are many peoepl who are waiting and hoping to see their Pi coin to be sellable on the market but I don't think it will be possible that everyone can sell theirs. Majority of the Pi fans wants to sell and I'm sure that the liquidity will be swiped instantly if there's a miracle that it will be listed on a DEX. I'm pertaining to those Pi who are being mined and earned.

comments.author: timoshani
comments.body: I joined the Pi community a year and a half ago. I mine its token regularly. But now I can’t log into my account, because my phone is lost, and the system does not allow me to send a free SMS to restore it. Has anyone in the Pi community encountered this issue?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: mdzahed134 on June 16, 2023, 07:01:32 PMI don't know how people are selling Pi network coin, where team claimed still they didn’t launch their main net. Right now it can't be transfer in a wallet to other. It’s just hyped when a fake PI coin is listed in the several exchanges. Also i think still there are no real value of Pi Coin, it’s kinda scam project to me. They see how much value they've got but there's no way to sell that. Those that have been into exchanges are not really the PI coins that these people are mining. There's no way for one to sell it and even the PI developers themselves are just keep on giving false hope to the users that have thinking they'll be able to cash out and sell these tokens one day in the future.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: avikz on June 16, 2023, 04:38:57 PMLol! Pi network is a scam beyond your imagination! It's less of a crypto scam and more of a KYC scam. Ask yourself a simple question! If anyone in the world can use their smartphones and start mining a coin for free, why would anyone else buy that coin from exchanges against money? Wouldn't they mine it from their mobile phone? If you get the answer to this question,, you will also understand that Pi coins will never have real value. Also, you need to do an extensive KYC in order to use the mined Pi coins, so if you like to maintain your privacy, avoid this project like a plague. I was introduced to pi years ago, even before I joined the forum. I mined for sometime and the other time I couldn't remember. Someone who introduced me said I should always set alarm to remind me to mine. But I re evaluated the whole thing and it didn't worth I was giving it. I had to uninstall the app from my phone and stopped mining.Till today the coin is not hosted on any exchange but they have large community base. Do you know if they want to create a community where they will always use the pi coin for services.

Do you know if they want to create a community where they will always use the pi coin for services.Those people just sold their Pi coin thru p2p and I understand why they do this type of hyping because they want this coin to be transacted by their holders so that they can earn with it. But in reality its hard for this coin to get listed on exchange since even the dev seems don't have plan for any exchange listing where there community could benefit with. They are the one who's enjoying the site traffic and what worst is their miners need to submit their Kyc details and that is really dangerous since any harm could happen to them if Pi dev will gone crazy and do worst thing.
